name: Changli
description: Changli is a counselor serving the Jinzhou Magistrate, and former Secretary-General in the capital. Shrouded in flames, she's fated to burn brightly until her final embers. With her fiery determination and strategic mindset, she rises to power, always thinking ahead to reach her ultimate goal.

details.Basic Attack: Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Fusion DMG. After releasing Basic Attack 4, enter True Sight, lasting for 12s.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consume Stamina to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG. After releasing Mid-air Attack 4, enter True Sight, lasting for 12s.
details.Heavy Attack: Hold Basic Attack on the ground to perform an upward strike at the cost of Stamina, dealing Fusion DMG. Use Basic Attack within a certain time to release Mid-air Attack 3.
details.Mid-air Heavy Attack: Shortly after holding Basic Attack in mid-air or using Basic Attack True Sight: Charge, use Basic Attack to perform a plunging attack at the cost of Stamina, dealing Fusion DMG. Use Basic Attack within a certain time to release Basic Attack 3.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

details.True Sight: Capture: After releasing Resonance Skill, Changli dashes towards the enemy and enters True Sight for 12s. At the end, she releases a plunging attack, dealing Fusion DMG. True Sight: Capture starts with 2 attempts; the number of attempts increases by 1 every 12s. Can be cast in mid-air.
details.Basic Attack: True Sight - Conquest: When in True Sight, using Ground Basic Attack releases True Sight: Conquest, dashing towards the enemy and dealing Fusion DMG (treated as Resonance Skill DMG). True Sight ends after Conquest.
details.Basic Attack: True Sight - Charge: When in True Sight, jumping or using Basic Attack in mid-air releases True Sight: Charge, dashing towards the enemy and dealing Fusion DMG (treated as Resonance Skill DMG). True Sight ends after Charge.

details.Effect: Deal Fusion DMG to nearby targets, obtain 4 stacks of Enflamement, and enter Fiery Feather. Can be cast in mid-air.
details.Fiery Feather: When Changli releases Heavy Attack Flaming Sacrifice within 10s, her ATK is increased by 25%, after which Fiery Feather ends.

details.Heavy Attack: Flaming Sacrifice: When releasing Heavy Attack, if Changli has 4 stacks of Enflamement, she consumes all stacks to cast Flaming Sacrifice, dealing Fusion DMG (treated as Resonance Skill DMG). While casting Flaming Sacrifice, Changli takes 40% less DMG.
details.Enflamement: Changli can hold up to 4 stacks of Enflamement. She gains 1 stack on hit with Basic Attack: True Sight - Conquest, 1 stack on hit with Basic Attack: True Sight - Charge, and 4 stacks when casting Resonance Liberation: Radiance of Fealty.

inherent_skill1.name: Secret Strategist
inherent_skill1.description: When Changli releases Basic Attack: True Sight - Conquest or Basic Attack: True Sight - Charge, for each stack of Enflamement, Changli's Fusion DMG Bonus is increased by 5%.

inherent_skill2.name: Sweeping Force
inherent_skill2.description: When Changli releases Heavy Attack Flaming Sacrifice or Resonance Liberation Radiance of Fealty, Changli's Fusion DMG Bonus is increased by 20%, and she ignores 15% of the target's DEF when dealing damage.

intro_skill.name: Obedience of Rules
intro_skill.description: Changli appears in mid-air, attacks the target, and enters True Sight, lasting for 12s.

outro_skill.name: Strategy of Duality
outro_skill.description: The incoming Resonator has their Fusion DMG amplified by 20% and Resonance Liberation DMG amplified by 25% for 10s or until the Resonator is switched out.

resonance_chain.s1: Resonance Skill Tripartite Flames and Heavy Attack Flaming Sacrifice increase Changli's DMG dealt by 10% and resistance to interruption.
resonance_chain.s2: Enflamement increases Changli's Crit Rate by 25% for 8s.
resonance_chain.s3: Resonance Liberation Radiance of Fealty DMG is increased by 80%.
resonance_chain.s4: After Intro Skill is cast, all team members' ATK is increased by 20% for 30s.
resonance_chain.s5: Heavy Attack Flaming Sacrifice's multiplier is increased by 50% and its DMG dealt is increased by 50%.
resonance_chain.s6: Resonance Skill Tripartite Flames, Heavy Attack Flaming Sacrifice, and Resonance Liberation Radiance of Fealty ignore an additional 40% of the target's DEF when dealing damage.
